text: Avarude Sanketham () is a 1992 Indian Malayalam-language film written and directed by Joseph Vattoli, starring Kollam Ajith and Yuvasree in lead roles. ==Plot== ==Cast== * Kollam Ajith as Maadan * Yuvasree as Maala *Ramu *Bobby Kottarakkara *TG Ravi as Kumar *Valsala Menon *Thodupuzha Vasanthy as Valli *Jagannatha Varma *Vincent as Jayan ==Release== ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films
title: Avarude Sanketham
